meanings.definition: Cook (food, especially meat) by prolonged exposure to heat in an oven or over a fire.
meanings.sent1: I will roast the chicken in the oven for dinner.
meanings.sent2: She likes to roast marshmallows over the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to roast the vegetables until they were crispy.
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed to roast everything under its scorching rays.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the roast turkey filled the kitchen with a delicious smell.

meanings.sent1: During the party, they would roast each other with jokes.
meanings.sent2: Friends often roast each other playfully to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The siblings would roast each other about their funny habits.
meanings.sent4: The comedian loved to roast the audience with his witty remarks.
meanings.sent5: The classmates would roast each other in a friendly banter session.

meanings.definition: A cut of meat that has been roasted or is suitable for roasting.
meanings.sent1: The roast was perfectly cooked and juicy.
meanings.sent2: She bought a large roast for the family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The delicious smell of the roast filled the dining room.
meanings.sent4: The roast on the table looked mouth-watering and tempting.
meanings.sent5: The holiday feast included a succulent roast that everyone enjoyed.
